Name: Bedroom
Text: You enter a lavish bedroom, but instead of a bed there is a large and beautiful coffin. A vampire must certainly live here, the velvet lining on the coffin makes you certain. A towering mirror is attached to the wall. What do you do?

Name: Mirror1
Text: You come closer to the mirror. A number of demonic faces decorate the frame. All of them are holding different gems in their mouths. On of them is missing a gem. What do you do?
Transitions: Place gem in the open socket

Name: Mirror2
Transitions: Place gem in the open socket

Name: Statue room1
Text: You go through the passage and enter an oval room filled with statues. At the far end there is a large statue of a gargoyle. As you approach the gargoyle, his eyes light up in green flames and he issues a warning: 'Only the head of the estate may pass'. What do you do?

Name: Gargoyle fight1
Text: You have only a fraction of a second to repond!  What do you do?
Transitions: Stop him with the holy cross!
Blow him up with the nitroglycerin!
